name: Diceified War
description:
MY Second Submmision To GMTK Game Jam!!(MAde in about 10-14 hrs wthout sleeping i geuss)

other 2 submissions:

https://itch.io/jam/gmtk-jam-2022/rate/1623104

https://itch.io/jam/gmtk-jam-2022/rate/1617167

Survive The Endless War Of Geo-Humanoid Wars!

Shoot With Left Click, Move With WASD, And RUN BY HOLDING SHIFT

There are 2 types of Enemies:

1) Annoying Green Dude: Doesn't Die, Move s randomly around, If you touch it, it Damages you.

Doesn't Shoot

2) Red Enemy DudE:

Shoots when it's near you, Dies with 5 bullets

throws/rolls 2 dices when it dies which gives you either health or Ammo

*If you Stand On Red Big Cubes, The Red Enemies can still shoot you(Red Bullet Passes through the Red Cubes)

Good Luck, and don't die !!!

Click To Continue...
